A stunning panoramic view of the lake from the kitchen/den area and the sliding windows that let in fresh air and sounds of the lake were incredible, but my absolute favorite luxury amenities would have to be the clawfoot tub and in-deck hot tub. Sherry & Trae also thoughtfully provided nice and thick robes for us use. Although we brought our own, now we could keep them dry and wear them around the bnb to feel extra warm and cozy. We felt safe, and secluded immediately upon walking in and because we mentioned that this was our first anniversary trip, and they were kind enough to leave a bottle of wine for us! 10/10 would visit this bnb again and recommend it to friends!
